source '/usr/local/Cellar/rbenv/1.0.0/libexec/../completions/rbenv.zsh'
command rbenv rehash 2>/dev/null
rbenv() {
  local command
  command="$1"
  if [ "$#" -gt 0 ]; then
    shift
  fi

  case "$command" in
  rehash|shell)
    eval "$(rbenv "sh-$command" "$@")";;
  *)
    command rbenv "$command" "$@";;
  esac
}

command rbenv rehash 2>/dev/null
function rbenv
  set command $argv[1]
  set -e argv[1]

  switch "$command"
  case rehash shell
    . (rbenv "sh-$command" $argv|psub)
  case '*'
    command rbenv "$command" $argv
  end
end
